item.title: How To Add A Stylish Pricing Table To Your WordPress Website | YouTube Q&A
item.description:
How To Add A Stylish Pricing Table To Your WordPress Website | YouTube Q&A

In this week's YouTube Q&A, I answer Michelle's question. Michelle asks, "How do I create a pricing table on my WordPress website that links to a landing page or payment page?" Great question, thanks Michelle! Hope this video is helpful to you and to everyone who wants to add a pricing table to your WordPress website.
